summary: Implements a Valentine/pizza-themed single-page React UI with Yes/No interactions, themed Tailwind tokens/animations, and a background pattern reference. However, required generated image assets are not present in the diff, and additional Internet Identity/auth + actor/react-query infrastructure was added despite being out of scope (no auth flows requested).

missing_requirements.requirement: Add the required generated images as static assets under frontend/public/assets/generated and render them in the page (hero illustration and subtle background pattern).
missing_requirements.reason: The app references the background pattern by URL, but the diff does not add the required image files under frontend/public/assets/generated (including the hero image). Without the assets present in the repository, the acceptance criteria that the images exist with specified filenames and load in production is not met based on this diff.

hallucinated_features.description: Internet Identity authentication context/provider and identity-based actor creation hooks (auth/identity infrastructure).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly lists user accounts/authentication flows as non-goals; no requirement requests Internet Identity integration. The diff adds authentication/identity management code and wires it into the app root.
